lines.text:
[Last lines]
His throat was torn exactly like the Marco case.

[Asking about the connection between the deaths]
What's the connection?
What connection could there be? Witchcraft?
Hardly. Not in this day and age... not in this day and age.
Aren't you pleased to see me?
Perhaps sometimes it's better to be.

[to Maitland]
All I can say to you is kep away from the skull of the Marquisde Sade!
